channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins vboxwrapper Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins vboxwrapper Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30968|2024-08-03T07:03:39.608Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vboxwrapper%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins vboxwrapper Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the name and description of VBox node parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
